Members

Research Team

Networks@Scale is carried out in the Institute of Informatics of the Federal University of Rio Grande do Sul (UFRGS) and we collaborate closely with collegues from IX.br and CGI.br / NIC.br. For further information please contact us.

Sobre

IPÊ Analytics, transformando dados brutos de monitoramento para gerar informações valiosas ao gerenciamento da rede.
